sensor.comment: type: pmw3901, caddx_infra256, caddx_infra256_aibox, usb_camera, csi_camera, analog_usb, opencv_any. i2c_address: 41 (0x29 default for Caddx)

tracker.comment: scale_factor converts sensor units to meters, height is in meters

position_x.comment: PID gains for X-axis position control

position_y.comment: PID gains for Y-axis position control

camera.comment: For USB/CSI/Analog cameras. device: 0 or /dev/video0, method: farneback or lucas_kanade

stick_input.comment: protocol: sbus, ppm, pwm, mock. mix_ratio: 0.0=full stab, 1.0=full manual

output.comment: Flight controller interface: mavlink, msp, or pwm

web_interface.comment: Web GUI for configuration and monitoring

ai_box.comment: AI Box configuration for Caddx Infra 256CA. mode: optical_flow_only, tracking_assist, object_detection, stabilization_enhanced, auto_mode. tracking_target: none, person, vehicle, custom_object, landing_pad, ground_texture
